data.text:
Bibliographic comments: See also under . Only Asimovâs fiction and autobiographical writings are listed here, in

chronological order of publication. Also as by Paul French.

Biographic comments: Became a US citizen in 1928.

Notes:

â¢ 'Positronic Robot' series.

â¢ The eight short fiction works in this omnibus were published separately in 1966 as Eight Stories from The Rest of

the Robots. That collection was later re-titled as The Rest of the Robots but did not restore the two novels.
